column1: back of a length and slung in at off stump, Malinga has Finch hopping. Fended straight to short cover. Klinger attempts a quick single. Finch yells 'no'. Klinger dishes out a full-length dive. The fielder didn't throw the stumps down in any case
shortish and on off stump, dabbed defensively to cover again
shortish on off, 130.8ks, punchily played to mid-on
back of a length and holds its line in the corridor, Finch stands up tall, punches and finds mid-off

Munaweera at short midwicket drops a sitter. Malinga covers his face up with his hands. Back of a length and sliding into the hips, this isn't a full-blooded flick from Finch. He simply lobs it in the air, Munaweera makes a royal mess of it. SL's fielding this series has been sloppy. Finch gets off the mark
ripper from Malinga. Good length, angled in, and swings away past the groping bat. Beats the outside edge lavishly. This might have been a wicket-maiden
What was that, Finch? He nearly swung himself off his feet. Length and wide outside off, past the tramline, Finch, having backed away outside leg, can't reach out and connect
length ball on off or just a shade outside off, Finch stays still, and hoists it over mid-on. Goes all the way though he did not middle it
Finch makes room outside leg again, this is an off-stump yorker. Finch reaches out for the ball and manages to dig it out towards cover
Klinger uses his feet, Kula drags his length back. Blocked in the direction of midwicket
slower delivery outside off, too full. Klinger goes over the top of mid-off. Sliced away in the air
shorter and outside off, Klinger leans back and late-cuts to square-ish third man
back of a length and angled into the right-hander, he throws his bat at the ball and drags a thick, fat inside edge to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, stands tall and punches crisply to mid-off
Finch goes inside-out. He backs away outside leg, collapses his back leg and lifts this length ball on leg stump over wide mid-off. One-bounce four
very full and veering down the leg side, past the glance. Leg-side wide from Sanjaya
leg-stump full-toss, clipped away to deep square leg
length and outside off, shapes away a bit, squeezed out to point. Klinger did not get close enough to the pitch

nice and full on middle, Klinger presses forward and lofts it straight over the bowler's head. Tharanga runs and chases down the wrong line. Misjudges it badly. He was then in contact with the boundary while attempting to flick the ball back into the field of play
low full-toss, which is patted to mid-on
full on the stumps, driven down the ground for one
full on off, Finch goes over the top again. Shovel-drives it with the bottom hand over mid-on
overpitched and outside off, Finch drives with a slicing finish to point
very full on middle, Finch backs away outside leg and drills to cover. More intent from Finch in this T20
very full and swerving in on middle and leg, a fierce whirl of the wrists sends the ball square of short fine leg. Skips away to the boundary. Wondering how Munaweera is feeling

Finch presses forward and drives this full ball back to the bowler. Kulasekara collects the ball and has a shy at the stumps. Finch spins around and cops a blow on the back. He's okay, though, acknowledging the apology from Kulasekara, who was just aiming the stumps with Finch having strayed out of his crease
Klinger welcomes Prasanna with a charming cover-drive. Full straight ball just outside off, crunched away
slides in with the arm on off, knocked to midwicket
short, turning legbreak outside off, he skips back and cuts it in the air between point and cover
lobbed up on middle and leg, Finch clears his front leg and swipes the ball away to deep midwicket
Finch has nailed this, bringing the fifty stand. He moves away outside leg, lofts it inside-out with the turn over wide mid-off
short and wide outside off, goes back and chops it away behind square on the off side for one
very full and straying into the leg stump, picked off to the left of square leg, no protection in the deep
full and into the pads again, flicked along the ground to deep midwicket
too full and straight, whipped away to the right of Prasanna at deep midwicket

an appeal for lbw, almost a run-out. All action at Adelaide. Full and angled in towards the leg stump, Klinger looks to play across the line and squirts an inside-edge onto the pad. Hotspot detects a blotch. Klinger drifts out of the crease, searches for a non-existent legbye, short cover attacks the ball, but does not hit the stumps. Klinger dives full-length and is safe
leg-side wide
full and outside off, leans forward and drives to cover
pitched up and outside off, eased through cover on the front foot
fast and short outside off, punched to long-off on the back foot
dropped short and breaks away outside off, leans back and cuts to backward point
back of a length on middle, backs away outside leg and chops to sweeper
slider outside off, played to the covers
length and outside off, worked towards mid-on
much slower through the air and spins away outside off, pushed to cover, can't get it past Shanaka there. A quiet over from Prasanna, just four off it
Siriwardana drags his length back after seeing Finch step out. The batsman adjusts and nudges to midwicket
Finch steps away outside leg, this is short too and outside off, belted away to the left of Asela at long-off
Siriwardana finds a hint of turn, dabbed to cover
short and angled into the hips, bunted to midwicket
short and outside off, hangs back and swats it to deep midwicket
Dropped on 0 by Munaweera, Finch surges to a fifty off 30 balls. Tossed on off, Finch sizes it up and launches it high and over midwicket. Caught in the crowd. Don't watch the replay, Munaweera
skids on outside off, laced through the covers
fired outside off, left alone

Finch can't clear the long boundary, Siriwardana pouches it at the edge of the long-off fence. Prasanna celebrates the wicket with a dab. Munaweera might be relieved, or has the damage been done already? Finch looks to loft this tossed-up legbreak over the fielder after backing away outside leg. No dice. Ends up slicing a catch
full on off, played back to the bowler
full, turning legbreak outside off, bends forward and drives to sweeper cover
short and outside off, forced away to cover on the back foot
floated down the leg side, beats the keeper too
slower cutter outside off, 87ks, push-driven to sweeper
floated on the leg stump, punched through midwicket
full and outside off, Klinger unleashes a slog-sweep and sends the ball soaring over midwicket. Puts Asela into the stands
little offcuter, comes in on off, bunted down to long-on
length ball on middle, seam-up, nearly 115ks, punched past Asela
length and outside off, jabbed back to Asela
clears Siriwardana at wide long-on. Full on off, goes across the line and swings the ball over the leaping fielder. Tonked for six
Sanjaya replies with a leg-stump yorker, dug back to the bowler
a really full delivery outside off, jabbing drive to cover
wide yorker, Dunk can't slice it away square through the off side. Beaten

Sanjaya drops a return catch, this wasn't as straightforward as the one in the first over . Sanjaya clutches his left hand in pain. He grimaces. Full on the stumps, drilled back to the bowler. Sanjaya is okay to resume
full-toss on middle, hit to long-on
floated on off stump, driven firmly to long-off
overpitched and outside off, carved out to backward point
full on the stumps, whipped away through midwicket
legcutter outside off, grips in the surface. Klinger slashes early and is beaten by the lack of pace
yorker just outside off, jammed out through extra cover
full-toss, dragged to the left of the bowler, who makes a half-stop
low full-toss outside off, shovelled with the bottom hand to long-on
full and fired into the leg stump, grazes the pad and rolls away to short fine leg
Dunk pre-meditates, shuffles across off, gets inside the line of a low full-toss on middle and scoops it right over Mendis' head
finesse followed by violence. Sanjaya errs in length again. Too full on middle, Dunk smites it over midwicket for back-to-back boundaries
full and wide outside off, scythed away to sweeper cover
low full-toss, on middle, angled in, Klinger uses the angle and flicks it away to the midwicket boundary
low full-toss on middle, swished to cover

what was that? Superb improvisation. Dunk shuffles across off, he attempted to scoop it fine on the leg side initially. Then changes his mind and scoops it fine of short third man as this was pushed wide outside off. Quick hands
dragged short and outside off, Dunk eyes up the leg side and mis-times it back to the bowler
wide yorker, beats Dunk. He reaches out, slashes and misses
off-stump yorker, squirted back to the bowler

Prasanna clings onto the catch, running back from point. Lands awkwardly on his elbow. Good length ball on off stump, Dunk looks to slog over midwicket. He ends up skewing it in the air. Prasanna hangs onto a swirling catch
back of a length and outside off, tapped to cover
slower full ball outside off, bunted down the ground
off-stump length ball, Head hangs back and works it to deep midwicket
very full on off, shovelled away to wide long-on
slower ball outside off, short, chopped to short third man
full on off, stroked to long-on
low full-toss on off stump, whipped away to deep square leg
really full on off stump, driven through the line to long-off for one
Klinger scores his maiden international fifty. What a moment for him. Slower short ball outside off, he waits on the back foot, and powerfully swats it away to the left of deep midwicket
very full on the pads, fine leg is inside the circle, glanced away fine of the fielder. He dives and makes a half-save
Head jumps out of the crease and flicks a couple to deep midwicket. Good running, they get two
Malinga apologies, Klinger acknowledges it. Full-toss above the waist, the line is outside leg, the batsman ducks under it. That probably slipped out of Malinga's hands
nails a yorker on middle, dug through midwicket
very full on the pads, Head picks the ball up and deposits it over square leg. Wonderful wristwork
This is even better from Head. Malinga can't get the yorker right again. Full on off stump, right in the slot, launched over Siriwardana at long-on
full-toss outside off, slapped to wide long-off for two
Malinga continues to err in length. Pitched up and outside off, Head lofts it nice and clean. Hit through the line straight of long-off
finally the yorker the line is on off, inside-edged onto the pad. The ball rolls away square on the leg side. 20 runs off the over
slower cutter outside off, 100.8ks, drags a slog-sweep to deep midwicket
yorker wide outside off, forced back to Kulasekara
full and wide outside off, Head drops to one knee and crunches it over cover. Udana tears across from sweeper cover and flicks the ball into the field of play
full and outside off, sliced in the air, does not carry to long-off
full on middle and leg, whipped away fiercely between deep midwicket and deep square leg. Klinger gives it a proper thump
Klinger gallops down the track, takes a full-toss and belts it to long-off
full-toss outside off, thrashed away to long-off, where Kapu fumbles. Easy two in the end for the hosts
Kapu overruns the ball but hangs onto the catch at long-off. Low full-toss outside off, Head loses his shape, swings and holes out in the deep

thigh-high full-toss, Klinger swats it away through square leg. Klinger commits to two. Shanka swoops down on the ball from deep square leg and throws it flat to Kusal Mendis. He collects it and swipes the bails off to catch Klinger short on the second. He raises his bat and walks back for 62
full-toss on leg stump, whipped to deep midwicket

The batsman comes down the track, this is full and wide outside off, cracked to Udana at extra cover. They take off for the single. Udana can't throw the stumps down at the non-striker's end. Malinga did not back up

Kapu pulls off a cracking catch now. He dashes in from long-on, dives forward, and takes it. Turner backs away outside leg. Malinga chases him and cramps him with a full-toss which is dragged away to Kapu. He did well to attack the catch
low full-toss on off, flat-batted to long-on
Australia have lost four wickets for five runs. Third catch for Kapu in the deep. Faulkner can't get hold of this full-toss outside off. He miscues it to long-on
full and sliding into the pads, misses the flick, they sneak a legbye
slower full ball wide outside off, Paine, having stepped outside leg, can't connect
full-toss on off stump, swiped away to deep midwicket
really full and wide outside off, carved away to point. Excellent final over from Shanaka
flat and skids on outside off, chopped to cover on the back foot
much slower through the air outside off, this is chopped away fine of backward point
angling down the leg side from around the wicket, leg-side wide. Did that brush the pad? Yep, hotspot detects it brushed the flap on its way down the leg side
straight ball on off, 91.6ks, played back to the bowler
tossed up on leg stump, backs away outside leg and drives it inside-out over the covers. Lovely shot
pushed through quicker, slides in from around the wicket, Tharanga plays across the line and is rapped on the pad but this was heading past the leg stump
back of a length on middle, Munaweera ventures deep in the crease and biffs it over long-on for a six
Munaweera moves outside leg, Richardson follows him with a 141ks yorker, sneaks under the legs of the batsman. Superb save from Paine
length ball angled in towards the leg stump, Munaweera sits back and smashes it over square leg for his second six in three balls
slower full ball on middle, Munaweera swings early and ends up miscuing the ball over the bowler's head. It still goes to the boundary
really full and slanting down leg past the flick. Wide. Richardson under pressure in his second international
Munaweera backs away outside leg. This is pushed wide outside off, carved in the air square of deep third man
hip-high short ball outside off, Tharanga swats it on the back foot to the left of mid-on

Zampa drops it at deep third man. Cummins could have had Munaweera with his first ball. Chest-high short ball just outside off. Munaweera jumps off the ground and ramps it in the air. Zampa back-pedals and loses his balance. Straight in and straight out
full and angling away past the outside edgfe at 144.4ks. Pace like fire
short on the leg stump, tucks 'em up for room. Deflected fine on the leg side
145.4ks missile on the leg stump, Tharanga is beaten for pace. The ball grazes the thigh and rolls to the leg side
short and angled in, Cummins hits the deck hard and gets it to bounce big. Left alone. Too high and that's a wide
145.5ks, full on middle, held up in the pitch a bit. Munaweera nearly chips a catch to mid-on
very full on the leg stump, 145.9ks, shovelled away past midwicket
starts off with a yorker outside off, squirted out towards point with an angled bat
pretty full on off stump, that's just a chip from Tharanga. Mid-on is inside the circle. It disappears over the boundary. That's some shot
middle-stump yorker, excellent response from Faulkner, dug out

Tharanga can't clear the long boundary. Holes out to Richardson at the edge of the deep midwicket boundary. Dug in short and outside off. Tharanga pulls well but can't get it over the man in the deep. Australia find some breathing space
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, swatted straight to short fine leg. Faulkner gets away
good length and angling away outside off, sliced down to third man
non-turning offbreak on off, played to the right of the bowler
shortish on middle, pulled away to deep square leg
fired on middle, short again, backs away and flashes to cover
good length on middle, ventures across off and scoops it over the keeper's head
pitched up and outside off, Mendis drops to one knee and slogs it over the bowler's head. He aimed midwicket and it went straight
92ks flatter and quicker on the stumps, hit into the vacant spaces in the leg side
good length and angled in on off, seam-up, tapped to midwicket
back of a length and skids on outside off, Munaweera steps away outside leg, reaches out for the ball. Slashes and misses
Munaweera jumps down the track and swings. The length was shorter with Henriques beating the batsman again
hip-high short ball on the off stump, swatted away to the right of deep square leg
113.9ks slower ball outside off, very full, drilled away to the right of Finch at mid-off
short of a length and outside off, chopped to point
quick fizzer on off, mis-hit back to the bowler
full and hurries on to beat the inside edge and rap the pad
pushed through on middle, backs away and punches to cover
slider on off, chopped from there to short third man

dragged short on the off stump, goes deep in the crease and pulls over midwicket. Faulkner runs in and attacks the ball as opposed to sitting back and taking it on the bounce. The ball beats him to the boundary
full slower ball on middle, Mendis slog-sweeps early and does not connect. The ball brushes the pad and rolls to long leg
tight line on off, slower ball again, opens the face and dinks a single to point
third slower ball of this over, Mendis picked it, and slogged it into the hands of deep midwicket. Full and angled in from over the wicket, Mendis drops to one knee and swings it to Cummins
back of a length and outside off, angled out to point
short and outside off, 142.5ks, Asela was caught between playing and leaving. Nearly chopped this cross-seamer back onto the stumps. Paine puts in another diving save
full and angled in on off, jammed out to the leg side

and he strikes with his first ball! Munaweera can't clear long-on. Pushed through on the stumps from around the wicket, Munaweera after backing away lofts it. Does not get enough power behind it and holes out. Turner gets into a side-on position and takes it
skids on off, dabbed to cover
speared outside off, punched to point
slider on middle, chopped to cover for one
full and angling across off, slashed in the air fine of backward point
very full on middle, Siriwardana makes room and hammers this down to long-off
pitches on middle and leg and rips away outside off past the outside edge. Siriwardana did not pick the googly. Beaten

Asela has been pinned lbw. Umpire Wilson raises his finger. No heroics from Asela today. Flat, non-turning ball on off, skids on and raps him on the knee-roll in front of off and middle. The tracker returns three reds
length ball on off, defended
looped up on off, slugged away to long-on

Henriques puts it down at backward point. Tossed up and turns away outside off, googly. Siriwardana slices in the air, Henriques leaps across to his left, the ball evades his outstretched hand. He can't snatch it on the rebound either
floated down the leg side, wide
slides across off, chopped away for one
down the track, meets a full-toss, and hits it back to the bowler. Head takes some pace off it and grimaces in pain
reverse-swept from middle stump to the point boundary. The fast hands from Kapu was the key to this shot
flighted on middle and leg, heaved away to deep square leg
down the track, this is short, inside-edged down to long-on
slower wrong'un from Zampa, Siri slogs and does not connect. Beaten
slower through the air outside off, 73ks, chips a drive to long-off
This was about 20ks quicker than the previous ball. Beats Kapu for pace. Quick fizzer, rushes onto Kapu. He is very late on it. Timbaaah. Why was Zampa left out of the previous game?
turn and bounce outside off, beats the outside edge

Zampa is turning it on at the Adelaide Oval. Looks like the flipper from the front of the hand, rushes onto the batsman and pings the pad in front of off stump. Finch hugs Zampa and Australia celebrate
back of a length on middle, opens the bat-face and plays to point
length ball on off, clubbed away to the left of long-on. Nearly went all the way for a six
full on middle and leg, hangs back and whips to deep midwicket
back of a length and outside off, guided to point
bouncer on middle, ducks under it. Too high, called a wide
good length on off, defended back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, slashed in the air past backward point
tossed up outside off, Siriwardana backs away and nails it over the covers for a six
lobbed up on middle, just 79ks, driven down the ground
Prasanna goes low for the slog-sweep. He only manages an inside edge to short fine leg
turn and bounce for Zampa. Siriwardana aims a reverse-sweep and sees the ball hit his chest
really full on the leg stump, whipped through midwicket
short legbreak outside off, Prasanna rocks back and flashes a cut in the air between backward point and cover
back of length and well outside off, dabbed towards backward point for a single
sliding down the leg side, shortish length, Prasanna slaps that behind deep backward square leg for four
slower on from Faulkner, slips down the leg side for a wide, Prasanna looked to thwack that behind square leg for four
pitched up and around off, squeezed away towards backward point
another loopy slower one from Faulkner, quite full and wide, batsman throws his bat at it, can't get it past cover point though

Prasanna picks out the man at deep backward square leg, joins the long line of Sri Lankans who have holed out in the deep today, this was angling down leg once more, Prasanna swung at it and connected well, but not well enough
pitched up and angling into the pads, did Kula get an inside edge on that? big appeal for lbw as it hits the pads, might have been sliding down, the ball rolls towards gully
back of length ball just outside off, guided toward backward point for a single
sharp short ball, just down the leg side though, called a wide, batsman had ducked under that
sweet shot from Siriwardana, short of length ball, swings and connects peerfectly, the ball sail over the midwicket boundary
fuller, thumped towards mid-on for a quick single

shot! perfectly struck straight drive from Kulasekara, powers that length ball so straight that it hits the stumps at the other end, still there's enough energy on the ball to run away past mid-on for four
pitched up and on middle, Siriwardana backs away from the stumps and pushes the ball towards mid-off for a single
dipping full-toss on the leg stump following Siriwardana who was backing away outside the leg stump. This is bunted in the gap at the covers. Two runs in the end. Good running
another slower delivery from the back of the hand. That's Faulkner's go-to ball. Siriwardana swishes and misses outside off

back of the hand slower ball on off stump, grips in the surface. Siriwardana does not pick this either - the third slower one of the over. He eyes up the leg side with a mow but only manages to sky it in the air. Faulker completes the return catch. Siriwardana goes and with it SL's chances?
good length and angling away outside off, Kulasekara opens the bat-face and pats it to point
113.5ks slower ball cutting away outside off, pushed towards mid-off
slower short ball on middle, played back to the bowler. Fine over from Faulkner
142.3ks good length ball on middle, Malinga makes room outside leg and pushes the ball straight to cover

full and outside off,  Malinga drives it to mid-off. He is pretty late to go for the single. Finch swoops down on the ball and nails a direct hit at the non-striker's end. Malinga, who was just ambling along for the single, is caught well short
full on leg stump, clipped away to deep square leg
full and outside off, clears his front leg and crunches it through the covers
dug in short and angled in, Sanjaya is beaten for pace and is pinged on the glove or the arm guard

Two run-outs to wrap up Sri Lanka's innings. Some consolation for Australia. Short on off, Sanjaya backs away outside leg and skews the ball over point. Sanjaya and Kulasekara push for two so that the latter could have the strike next over. Dunk throws the ball to Paine who flips the bails off. Sanjaya can't make it in time
